1.2.2.name: wordpress/the-bizness
1.2.2.description: The Bizness is a professional and flexible business oriented WordPress theme. It can be used for a traditional blog style site, but also includes an alternative home page template with an attractive image slider which makes it ideal for small businesses. You can upload your own logo as well as customize the primary theme colors and background to suit your brand.
